document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Haul River near [[Qadib]].
document_data.name: Al-Haul River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Haul River''' was a small river found in the [[Free Cities of Zakhara|Free Cities]] of [[North Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: The river flowed down from the [[Furrowed Mountains]] on a northwestern course before reaching the [[Great Sea]].
document_data.Description: [[Qadib]], the City of Wands, was founded along Al-Haul's eastern bank. As with all rivers found along the coast of North Zakhara, the lands surrounding the banks of Al-Haul as it neared the coast were highly fertile, allowing the city and its inhabitants to flourish.
